website_summaries.verdict: The thick brush does wonders for your top lashes. The low price point is a bonus.
pros: Gentle on sensitive eyes and contact wearers
Sits at a bargain price point
Collagen-infused formula produces thick, full lashes
Stays on all day, but is easy to remove at night
cons: Large, thick brush is difficult to use on bottom lashes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! Coverage is great, 2 coats gives you gorgeous lashes. I get so many compliments since is started using this mascara, and it is half the price of my old mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong mascara in open package!!
customer_reviews.text: Wrong mascara sent, picture shows black and orange tube with curved brush which is what I use instead I get the straight brush all orange tube which I hate and never but furthermore the package was open, is it tampered with? Safe to use? Loaded with anthrax? Who knows, very disappointed and feel mislead and certainly will be throwing this away waste of time to bother shipping back 😑 if I could give zero stars I would!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Shirav

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: The Rimmel black mascara goes on well and looks good with no clumping on my eyelashes. I like the affordable price and the quick delivery date. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great great great
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this mascara since high school. It’s harder to find nowadays so I order online. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing :(
customer_reviews.text: It was a great value but my daughter opened hers on christmas and the brush was completely crushed inside. unusable/ prebroken. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: LoisIris

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: The water proof in this mascara was really good, my eyes water or get dry & need eye drops and it's held up to both thus far. I didn't get the length other reviewers posted but with a few others I've gotten length or volume but they either made my eyes itch or ran when my eyes watered. I only applied 1 coat so for the price & availability (Amazon or any drug store) I think I will stick with this and add a second coat.
customer_reviews.author: Just Inga

customer_reviews.title: Makes my eyelashes stand out.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of expensive mascaras that I just throw away because they aren’t as good as this one. I always get asked if my lashes are real. Just put on a couple coats.
customer_reviews.author: G. Elson

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara for the money I have found anywhere. Love the brush. Love the way it goes on. Washes off easily with soap and water. I bought it for my daughter when she started wearing makeup because it was cheaper. Found out it was better than my expensive mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Boom, I have lashes
customer_reviews.text: Makes my lashes look nice! If you want thicker and more lashes start with castor oil first for a month. You will see a huge difference then try this mascara...super change!
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara. I've used this brand for many years and have never had an issue with clumping. My eyes get easily irritated by some makeup but I've never had that issue with Rimmel. Highly recommended if you love longer looking lashes and have sensitive eyes to certain makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kay

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter pays $25 for mascara. This mascara is the best. It really makes your eyelashes look much longer. You can’t beat the quality and price of this mascara. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I‘ve been using this mascara for years. It’s awesome. Makes my lashes long. I use two or three coats. I combine this with the loreal kash paradise primer.
customer_reviews.author: Julygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Really is water proof and wand is made for easy application
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth britt

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this mascara for quite some time and I think it's great, the ones I got arrived fast and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cecy ZO

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara for the money
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Dior Black Out mascara but they changed their product and now this is the best one I could find.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. It makes your eyelashes look so long and it last all day. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: All time favorite
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite mascara! Been wearing it for years and still have a lot of compliments and questions on what kind of mascara I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product ordered in 2020 was produced mid 2018.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the product it seemed 'wrong'. The brush was flat and the product seemed thick and clumpy, the way you expect older mascara to look when you know it's time to toss it out. I decided to do a batch check on my product and found that it was manufactured in 2018 making it 1 1/2 years old when I ordered it. I opted to return the product and will be checking batch codes from now on as make-up seems to be very hit or miss from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Random Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice at putting on make up. This is very easy to use and I love the color
customer_reviews.author: Sherrct

customer_reviews.title: I have to chuck
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for my eyelashes (barely even a tint to the color never mind elongate them). Also still smudged under my eyes. That was the point of getting waterproof - so I wouldn't have smudging. Wish I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get this for a lot less than the prices in-store, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sam D

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: This mascara was buildable but was too clumpy for my liking. I ended up using this until I got something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Great return policy!
customer_reviews.text: This product went on clumpy and thick for me. I have pretty fine lashes and I'm not a fan of the type of wand it came with. Other people might enjoy it but I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking for a mascara that really stays put
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item Does make your lashes bigger and longer but rubs off, smudges and runs very Badly Was very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great price but you get what you pay for terrible did not work for me at all I would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Teresa kaslovCan’t beat the price definitely going to buy mores

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for many years is great I just use this one is perfect iready. I recommended
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Is Not Always A Deal...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Tube felt "light" almost as if not much product in it?? VERY light application onto lashes. Does not accentuate lashes as anticipated. Gave racoon eyes within the hour. Difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Marcina

customer_reviews.title: You can do better
customer_reviews.text: Brush is huge & hard to work @ eye córners. Not great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: 💇 2dpoint

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love the application wand, it's big. Minimal flaking. Better than my old standby maybelline full and soft. The only complaint I have is that it runs kinda easily... next time I will buy waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: lushes lashes
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm amazed by length that this mascara gives, No clumping just beautiful lashes
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get the right product
customer_reviews.text: I have used Rimel Scandaleyes curved brush for a while. When I got my latest order it was Rimel Scandalaleyes straight brush - a different product. It works okay but would have much preferred the one I ordered. Because the order price was good I did not return it but won't order online again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Swedenborg

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara, makes lashes super long. Doesn't run or clump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about buying online but this is really good, easy-to-use and looks fabulous on your eyes
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lashes
customer_reviews.text: No clumping goes on smooth I really like this mascara. Will purchase again. The price is awesome for the product given.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne101

customer_reviews.title: Won’t transfer when you get sweaty
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Not clumpy, won’t get on your under eye either.
customer_reviews.author: So happy!

customer_reviews.title: Lashes look fake and not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Makes my eyelashes look fake and not in a good way. They double in length and seem to stick together but look thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Smooth! Lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Applies evenly. Lasts for a long time. I have loads of allergies and this mascara doesn't bother me at all. This is my new favorite mascara!
customer_reviews.author: DrJean

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good mascara. It doesn’t clump much and looks good. Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Simone18

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching and searching for a good mascara for a long time now. The one that I’ve used for years, they don’t sell anymore. I even went onto the product website to by it and it is not there. I am very happy with this product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst mascara I’ve used. You get what you pay for 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth as much as it costs, not a compliment
customer_reviews.text: nice enough but not buying again. flakes off within hours.
customer_reviews.author: John Dillinger

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was completely out of mascara and order this in a pinch because it was cheap. It worked for a couple days until I could get to the store, but I would not purchase it again. It makes my eyes burn and water and runs, is clumpy and takes a few coats to look decent.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara really build up your lashes. You may have to use another tool to de-clump a little but it is worth it for your lashes to look full and lovely! Other mascaras I have tried don't enhance my lashes and you can barely tell I am wearing mascara. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says
customer_reviews.text: This is not waterproof. Both arrived regular and not as described. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Another great find
customer_reviews.text: Love the mascara,as it gives me FULL lashes and stays on all day without flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this. A waste of my money. My Dollar Tree one is better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. When used with primer this product is great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley walker

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving of what you get
customer_reviews.text: Curve alert is the pictured mascara but it is not the one you get when you purchase it...
customer_reviews.author: tasha hobart

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand and find it easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. White

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Words can’t express how bad this mascara is! I knew in seconds it was the worst. Does not act like waterproof make up. My curled lashes straightened instantly. So disappointed. So much for reviews!
customer_reviews.author: rachel h.

customer_reviews.title: An okay mascara
customer_reviews.text: It's a good mascara. The only problem is that it's a little messy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Maravilla

customer_reviews.title: I Do Not Recommend Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: It arrived yesterday and it is dried out! I couldn't apply it. Trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustyblue

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is not the average mascara that u get for 4 dollars at the beauty store. It does not clump, it keeps your eyelashes thin, it is 100% water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Jayla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially for the price! Made my lashes to long and dark! Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted very long
customer_reviews.text: Did not irritate my eyes. Made my lashes look great
customer_reviews.author: patobrien

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent mascara but still goes on very thick. You have to be careful to avoid clumping
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Super dry
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and was so dry I can barley use it.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara- by far! Great coverage- doesn't clump up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Upchurch

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Separates my lashes beautifully with no buildup or clumps! Easy to take off with water in the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pirog

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is very dry. Doesn't coat well. Dries very brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I Am

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: This did not last long. It got dried up very quickly. I liked how the lashes looked but either the product was not a full bottle or it was an old bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Allen

customer_reviews.title: Ok...
customer_reviews.text: It’s waterproof but doesn’t do much for volume as the original.
customer_reviews.author: JTUP2005

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: I've used this stuff for years, it's got the biggest application brush which reveals super long lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ann Gatherum

customer_reviews.title: Never again will I buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: Just another average mascara. Nothing special to it. I wouldn’t recommend this mascara. I am so disappointed! Never again will I buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sintia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing one This is my third time to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Laura lawandy

customer_reviews.title: full brush
customer_reviews.text: i really liked the full brush, but after a week it seemed to get a little runny or thin. good price was getting hard to find in stores, wish it would come in brown/black
customer_reviews.author: pe

customer_reviews.title: Great for long lashes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE this mascara!! My lashes are very long and thick, this makes them pop without looking like spider legs. Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Crank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is better than high dollar mascara I have purchased. Try it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Arnold

customer_reviews.title: That I use a curved brush and mascara goes on good and stays on
customer_reviews.text: The brush is to thick and it doesn’t stay long on the lashes
customer_reviews.author: Jane munoz

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed.....did nothing for my lashes. I could barely notice that I had any on.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shinerette

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey but worth the cost, held up well all day even after a gym session still looked good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy Wet Mess
customer_reviews.text: Worst mascara I’ve ever used. Clumpy clumpy clumpy. Wet wet wet. Clumpy, wet mess.
customer_reviews.author: LTP

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was apart!
customer_reviews.text: Very concerning! I received the mascara and 2 items were not in the package like it’s so old that the glue was dried out!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Affordable plus a good product
customer_reviews.text: It makes your lashes more. Makes your eye lashes look more!
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Ashland

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked the application brush to be the same as the non waterproof one
customer_reviews.author: B Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: Product came dried out like it was 2 months old. Ugh disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: This mascara was very dry and easily smudged. It was cheap, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bazemore

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: Love this product normally but was dried out when I got it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: The mascara did not get a thick long lash as advertised. This product is a waste of $$$ totally.
customer_reviews.author: rusti woods

customer_reviews.title: ... volume but if you have short lashes it is good to use a lengthening mascara under this one
customer_reviews.text: Works well for volume but if you have short lashes it is good to use a lengthening mascara under this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara but it is not what I received. I got a different one in my package.
customer_reviews.author: Weber’s

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: The product really helped me dress up my eyes. I love the big brush. Product was shipped quickly. It is good with water proofing aspect of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cavett

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Product came dry & doesn’t really do much to the lashes
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: OLD AND DRY
customer_reviews.text: Mascara was old and dry, had to throw away within a week.
customer_reviews.author: kallia shook

customer_reviews.title: hard to get off
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the hype, it’s very hard to get off
customer_reviews.author: Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but it doesn't give the lift that other Rimmel products does.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE MASCARA
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara out there! my lashes are like BAM when I put this on. I apply 3-5 thick layers of mascara and my lashes look like falsies. LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: shantel

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Got here very fast. And brand new totally sealed. Great mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Sweet

customer_reviews.title: product review
customer_reviews.text: this product is amazing it is waterproof and it gives your eyelashes volume and length but the perfect product if you are interested it is amazing!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sollesnes

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Did not know it was waterproof because it said nothing in description about that. Don't like waterproof. 😠
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: different than pictures
customer_reviews.text: It's actually an orange tube I usally Order mASCAR for the tube. .. it's nice and think for different looks. If you are older than 30 just looking for a good mascara this isn't the one it has a nice huge brush that gets more mascara than you need , but sometimes that's the look I want.
customer_reviews.author: zoie

customer_reviews.title: Just another mascara.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this brand after seeing it described as a user's favorite on her beauty blog. I did not find anything to rave about in the applicator nor in the look after applying it to my eyelashes. And the container is quite ugly, not something I want to pull from my makeup bag in front of other women. As well, since I have issues with my eyes burning if product migrates, I opted for waterproof, assuming that feature would prevent it from migrating. Unfortunately, after several hours, it was smudged under lower lashes even though it had not been applied to my lower lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Ali oops!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 different mascaras recommended by beauty blogs. The Scandaleyes brush was not to my liking and I did not see any big different in volume. I will be going back to my old tried-and-true - L'Oreal Voluminous Butterfly mascara. It was very difficult to apply this mascara to my bottom lashes...without getting it on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: The Wicked Sass

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The only mascara I have ever had to throw away. The brush is too big and the container mouth is too wide so too much mascara is left on the brush- it's just has tons of mascara all over it. Total mess, tried it several times and had to throw it away.. what a waste
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it’s cruelty-free. It’s easy to apply and I like the brush. But, there’s something in the formula. Or not enough of something, as it’s thin. I don’t dislike it. I don’t love it. I would buy it again if I was in a jam.
customer_reviews.author: Tara0771

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara. It definitely defines and lengthens my lashes. My only con is that it does go on wet so you have to allow it to dry. Excellent price and actually works better than some pricey mascaras I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: CWood

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect picture
customer_reviews.text: This is not the black and orange tube advertised. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Heavy with lots of clumping
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is very thick. It is goopy and just makes my lashes stick together. The heaviness of the mascara weighs my lashes down after I curl them. I will not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: sdr2000

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found one mascara that I like better. This goes on nice and thick so you really only need one coat. They lengthen as well!
customer_reviews.author: Always_Andi

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Great waterproof mascara! Does not run or peel. Comes off easily at night with baby oil, vaseline or waterproof mascara liquid remover. Resists tears. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tonkmom

product_meta.title: Rimmel Scandaleyes Waterproof Mascara, Black, 0.41 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Waterproof Black
product_meta.description: Color:Waterproof Black| Size:1 Count| Style Name:MascaraFor lashes so big, it's almost criminal. Waterproof. MaxDensity Brush: 50% larger. Captures and plumps every lash. Supersize formula with 3x collagen + 3x keratin. versus Rimmel Volume Flash The Max.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
